img_summary: The image shows an inventory screen from a video game, displaying a selection of key items. One item, highlighted in purple, is called "The Spirit of Captain Wise-Voice," classified as an epic key item. The description notes it as "A unique cluster of will that cannot be cultivated. Why not gather it and explore its potential elsewhere?" The inventory interface includes options for self-advance, relics, equipment, journal, and settings. The player has a total of 40,305 of an unspecified currency or resource. The screen also provides options to examine, sort, or return.
